clkao are you still using loomio for voting or have you moved those functions fully into your own website
Well we don't have much to vote on lately... But I think for finite group its still the best. Tkirby has a vote app too
clkao what is your approx size estimate of "finite"\
Au might have a better idea. What I meant is something not open-ended
yeah generally loomio works fine if the potential number of participants is lower than Dunbar's number ( <150 ) and it's about shared resource allocation rather than open-ended brainstorming

by open-ended brainstorming, a while ago it was attempted to scale into a general discussion forum for Taiwan's Economic National Affairs Conference, but it was difficult to form rough consensus with a large number of previously unconnected people
for that use case clkao has been experimenting with pol.is et al
thank you au and clkao!
np :)
